meanings.definition: A support for the head, as on a bed or in a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The headrest in the car kept me comfortable during the long drive.
meanings.sent2: I leaned back on the headrest of the chair and closed my eyes.
meanings.sent3: When the headrest fell off the bed, it decided to take a nap on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a soft headrest for his weary soul.
meanings.sent5: The fluffy headrest felt like a cloud supporting my head.

meanings.definition: A cushion or pad at the back of a chair, car seat, etc., on which one's head can rest.
meanings.sent1: The headrest on the car seat was so plush and cozy.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted the headrest on the chair to find the perfect position.
meanings.sent3: The headrest on the sofa seemed to be whispering 'nap time' to me.
meanings.sent4: His words served as a mental headrest after a long day.
meanings.sent5: The headrest on the plane was a welcome relief during the turbulent flight.
